mapper.insert: insert into INF132340.OSKARZONY (CRIMINAL_ID, CRIME_CATEGORY, NAME, SURNAME, CODEX_ARTICLE, PESEL, LAWSUIT_ID, OBRONCA_CARD_ID) values (#{criminalId,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{crimeCategory,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{surname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{codexArticle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pesel,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{lawsuitId,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{obroncaCardId,jdbcType=NUMERIC})
mapper.update: update INF132340.OSKARZONY set CRIME_CATEGORY = #{crimeCategory,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SURNAME = #{surname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CODEX_ARTICLE = #{codexArticle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PESEL = #{pesel,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, LAWSUIT_ID = #{lawsuitId,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, OBRONCA_CARD_ID = #{obroncaCardId,jdbcType=NUMERIC} where CRIMINAL_ID = #{criminalId,jdbcType=NUMERIC}
mapper.select: select CRIMINAL_ID, CRIME_CATEGORY, NAME, SURNAME, CODEX_ARTICLE, PESEL, LAWSUIT_ID, OBRONCA_CARD_ID from INF132340.OSKARZONY where CRIMINAL_ID = #{criminalId,jdbcType=NUMERIC}
